medical_history.chief_complaint: Severe acute right upper quadrant (RUQ) pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 3 weeks ago with biliary colic. Last night at 9 PM, the patient experienced another episode of severe RUQ pain approximately 3 hours after eating dinner. The pain was unremitting and worsened until around 11 PM when the patient sought evaluation.
medical_history.past_medical_history:
- CAD s/p inferior STEMI
- s/p PCI to LAD with DES
- HLD
- GERD
- Colonic polyps
- Vocal cord polyps
medical_history.family_history: Siblings with valvular heart disease and possibly irregular heart rhythms. No premature heart disease or sudden death. Gallbladder disease in father.
